trans-unit.resname: PZ2·65669 | Hammer of Nazahn | Card Name
PZ2·65669 | Hammer of Nazahn | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Whenever CARDNAME or another Equipment enters the battlefield under your control, you may attach that Equipment to target creature you control.
trans-unit.target: 每当CARDNAME或另一个武具在你的操控下进战场时，你可以将该武具贴附在目标由你操控的生物上。

trans-unit.resname: PZ2·65669 | Hammer of Nazahn | Card Text | Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: Equipped creature gets +2/+0 and has indestructible.
trans-unit.target: 佩带此武具的生物得+2/+0且具有不灭异能。

trans-unit.resname: PZ2·65669 | Hammer of Nazahn | Card Text | Paragraph 3
PZ2·65671 | Traverse the Outlands | Card Name
PZ2·65671 | Traverse the Outlands | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Search your library for up to X basic land cards, where X is the greatest power among creatures you control. Put those cards onto the battlefield tapped, then shuffle.
trans-unit.target: 从你牌库中搜寻至多X张基本地牌，X为由你操控之生物中的最大力量。将这些牌横置放进战场，然后洗牌。

trans-unit.resname: PZ2·65673 | Fortunate Few | Card Name
trans-unit.note: 非官方中文翻译来自legacy card name（2024-02-28）；MO上的宝箱牌，来自各个系列。

trans-unit.resname: PZ2·65675 | The Ur-Dragon | Card Name
PZ2·65675 | The Ur-Dragon | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Eminence — As long as CARDNAME is in the command zone or on the battlefield, other Dragon spells you cast cost {1} less to cast.
trans-unit.target: 威仪～只要CARDNAME在统帅区中或战场上，你施放的其他龙咒语便减少{1}来施放。

trans-unit.resname: PZ2·65675 | The Ur-Dragon | Card Text | Paragraph 2
PZ2·65675 | The Ur-Dragon | Card Text | Paragraph 3
trans-unit.source: Whenever one or more Dragons you control attack, draw that many cards, then you may put a permanent card from your hand onto the battlefield.
trans-unit.target: 每当一个或数个由你操控的龙攻击时，抓等量的牌，然后你可以将一张永久物牌从你手上放进战场。

trans-unit.resname: PZ2·65677 | Alms Collector | Card Name
PZ2·65677 | Alms Collector | Card Text | Paragraph 1
PZ2·65677 | Alms Collector | Card Text | Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: If an opponent would draw two or more cards, instead you and that player each draw a card.
trans-unit.target: 如果某对手将抓两张或更多牌，则改为你和该牌手各抓一张牌。

trans-unit.resname: PZ2·65679 | Path of Ancestry | Card Name
PZ2·65679 | Path of Ancestry | Card Text | Paragraph 1
PZ2·65679 | Path of Ancestry | Card Text | Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: {T}: Add one mana of any color in your commander's color identity. When that mana is spent to cast a creature spell that shares a creature type with your commander, scry 1. (Look at the top card of your library. You may put that card on the bottom of your library.)
trans-unit.target: {T}：加一点法术力，其颜色为你指挥官标识色中的任一颜色。当该法术力用来施放与你指挥官具共通生物类别的生物咒语时，占卜1。

trans-unit.resname: PZ2·65681 | Fractured Identity | Card Name
trans-unit.note: 非官方中文翻译来自legacy card name（2024-02-28）；

trans-unit.resname: PZ2·65683 | Heirloom Blade | Card Name
PZ2·65683 | Heirloom Blade | Card Text | Paragraph 1
PZ2·65683 | Heirloom Blade | Card Text | Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: Whenever equipped creature dies, you may reveal cards from the top of your library until you reveal a creature card that shares a creature type with it. Put that card into your hand and the rest on the bottom of your library in a random order.
trans-unit.target: 每当佩带此武具的生物死去时，你可以从你牌库顶开始展示牌，直到展示出一张与之具共通生物类别的生物牌为止。将该牌置于你手上，其余则以随机顺序置于你的牌库底。

trans-unit.resname: PZ2·65683 | Heirloom Blade | Card Text | Paragraph 3
trans-unit.target: 佩带{1}（{1}：贴附在目标由你操控的生物上。只能于法术时机佩带。）

trans-unit.resname: PZ2·65685 | Magus of the Mind | Card Name
trans-unit.note: 非官方中文翻译来自legacy card name（2024-02-28）；心之所欲的对应贤者

trans-unit.resname: PZ2·65687 | Boneyard Scourge | Card Name
trans-unit.note: 非官方中文翻译来自legacy card name（2024-02-28）；

trans-unit.resname: PZ2·65689 | Scalelord Reckoner | Card Name
trans-unit.note: 非官方中文翻译来自legacy card name（2024-02-28）；

trans-unit.resname: PZ2·65691 | Territorial Hellkite | Card Name
PZ2·65691 | Territorial Hellkite | Card Text | Paragraph 1
PZ2·65691 | Territorial Hellkite | Card Text | Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: At the beginning of combat on your turn, choose an opponent at random that CARDNAME didn't attack during your last combat. CARDNAME attacks that player this combat if able. If you can't choose an opponent this way, tap CARDNAME.
trans-unit.target: 在你回合的战斗开始时，从你上次战斗中CARDNAME未攻击过的对手里随机选择一位。CARDNAME本次战斗若能攻击该牌手，则必须如此作。如果没有能以此法选择的对手，则横置CARDNAME。

trans-unit.resname: PZ2·65693 | Edgar Markov | Card Name
trans-unit.note: 非官方中文翻译来自legacy card name（2024-02-28）；

trans-unit.resname: PZ2·65695 | Disrupt Decorum | Card Name
PZ2·65695 | Disrupt Decorum | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Goad all creatures you don't control. (Until your next turn, those creatures attack each combat if able and attack a player other than you if able.)
trans-unit.target: 煽惑所有不由你操控的生物。（直到你的下一个回合，那些生物每次战斗若能攻击，则必须攻击，且若能攻击除你以外的牌手，则必须如此作。）

trans-unit.resname: PZ2·65697 | Crimson Honor Guard | Card Name
PZ2·65697 | Crimson Honor Guard | Card Text | Paragraph 1
PZ2·65697 | Crimson Honor Guard | Card Text | Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: At the beginning of each player's end step, CARDNAME deals 4 damage to that player unless they control a commander.
trans-unit.target: 在每位牌手的结束步骤开始时，除非该牌手操控指挥官，否则CARDNAME对他造成4点伤害。

trans-unit.resname: PZ2·65699 | Bloodsworn Steward | Card Name
PZ2·65699 | Bloodsworn Steward | Card Text | Paragraph 1
PZ2·65699 | Bloodsworn Steward | Card Text | Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: Commander creatures you control get +2/+2 and have haste.
trans-unit.target: 由你操控的指挥官生物得+2/+2且具有敏捷异能。

trans-unit.resname: PZ2·65701 | Teferi's Protection | Card Name
PZ2·65701 | Teferi's Protection | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Until your next turn, your life total can't change and you gain protection from everything. All permanents you control phase out. (While they're phased out, they're treated as though they don't exist. They phase in before you untap during your untap step.)
trans-unit.target: 直到你的下一个回合，你的总生命不会改变，且你获得反一切保护异能。所有由你操控的永久物跃离。（它们于跃离期间视作不存在。于你的重置步骤中重置之前，它们跃回。）

trans-unit.resname: PZ2·65701 | Teferi's Protection | Card Text | Paragraph 2
PZ2·65703 | Shifting Shadow | Card Name
PZ2·65703 | Shifting Shadow | Card Text | Paragraph 1
PZ2·65703 | Shifting Shadow | Card Text | Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: Enchanted creature has haste and "At the beginning of your upkeep, destroy this creature. Reveal cards from the top of your library until you reveal a creature card. Put that card onto the battlefield and attach CARDNAME to it, then put all other cards revealed this way on the bottom of your library in a random order."
trans-unit.target: 所结附的生物具有敏捷与「在你的维持开始时，消灭此生物。从你的牌库顶开始展示牌，直到展示出一张生物牌为止。将该牌放进战场，并将CARDNAME贴附于其上，然后将所有其他以此法展示的牌以随机顺序置于你的牌库底。」

trans-unit.resname: PZ2·65705 | Wasitora, Nekoru Queen | Card Name
PZ2·65705 | Wasitora, Nekoru Queen | Card Text | Paragraph 1
PZ2·65705 | Wasitora, Nekoru Queen | Card Text | Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: Whenever CARDNAME deals combat damage to a player, that player sacrifices a creature. If the player can't, you create a 3/3 black, red, and green Cat Dragon creature token with flying.
trans-unit.target: 每当CARDNAME对任一牌手造成战斗伤害时，该牌手牺牲一个生物。若该牌手无法如此作，则你派出一个3/3，黑红绿三色，具飞行异能的猫／龙衍生生物。

trans-unit.resname: PZ2·65707 | Mirri, Weatherlight Duelist | Card Name
PZ2·65707 | Mirri, Weatherlight Duelist | Card Text | Paragraph 1
PZ2·65707 | Mirri, Weatherlight Duelist | Card Text | Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: Whenever CARDNAME attacks, each opponent can't block with more than one creature this combat.
trans-unit.target: 每当CARDNAME攻击时，本次战斗中每位对手均不能以多于一个生物进行阻挡。

trans-unit.resname: PZ2·65707 | Mirri, Weatherlight Duelist | Card Text | Paragraph 3
trans-unit.source: As long as CARDNAME is tapped, no more than one creature can attack you each combat.
trans-unit.target: 只要CARDNAME已横置，每次战斗攻击你的生物便不能多于一个。

Put those cards onto the battlefield, then shuffle the rest of the revealed cards into your library.

PZ2·65725 | Kindred Discovery | Card Text | Paragraph 1

PZ2·65733 | O-Kagachi, Vengeful Kami | Card Text | Paragraph 2

trans-unit.source: Whenever you cast an instant or sorcery spell from your hand, if CARDNAME attacked this turn, that spell gains rebound. (Exile the spell as it resolves. At the beginning of your next upkeep, you may cast that card from exile without paying its mana cost.)
trans-unit.target: 每当你从你手上施放瞬间或法术咒语时，若CARDNAME本回合中攻击过，则该咒语获得弹回异能。（于该咒语结算时将之放逐。在你下一个维持开始时，你可以从放逐区施放该牌，且不须支付其法术力费用。）

PZ2·65763 | Kess, Dissident Mage | Card Text | Paragraph 2

trans-unit.target: 于你的每个回合中，你可以从你坟墓场中施放一个瞬间或法术咒语。如果以此法施放的咒语将进入你的坟墓场，则改为将它放逐。

trans-unit.resname: PZ2·65765 | Curse of Vitality | Card Name
trans-unit.note: 非官方中文翻译来自legacy card name（2024-02-28）；

trans-unit.resname: PZ2·65767 | Curse of Verbosity | Card Name
PZ2·65767 | Curse of Verbosity | Card Text | Paragraph 1
PZ2·65767 | Curse of Verbosity | Card Text | Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: Whenever enchanted player is attacked, you draw a card. Each opponent attacking that player does the same.
trans-unit.target: 每当所结附的牌手被攻击时，你抓一张牌。每位正向该牌手进行攻击的对手亦如此。

trans-unit.resname: PZ2·65769 | Stalking Leonin | Card Name
PZ2·65769 | Stalking Leonin | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: When CARDNAME enters the battlefield, secretly choose an opponent.
trans-unit.target: 当CARDNAME进战场时，私下选择一位对手。

trans-unit.resname: PZ2·65769 | Stalking Leonin | Card Text | Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: Reveal the player you chose: Exile target creature that's attacking you if it's controlled by the chosen player. Activate only once.
trans-unit.target: 公布所选牌手：如果目标正向你进行攻击的生物由该牌手操控，则放逐之。只能起动一次。

trans-unit.resname: PZ2·65771 | Nazahn, Revered Bladesmith | Card Name
trans-unit.note: 非官方中文翻译来自legacy card name（2024-02-28）；
